src:
FOTO: Slovenec jih je skrival v posebej prirejenem prostoru 
Nekaj jih je izročil, nekaj pa so jih našli policisti.
06 Nov 2019, 08:48 by T. V.



Zaseženi arzenal. FOTO: PP Ljutomer



Policija je pri 55-letniku opravila hišno preiskavo (simbolična fotografija). FOTO: Tadej Regent, Delo


LJUTOMER – Policisti PP Ljutomer so zadnji dan letošnjega oktobra na podlagi odredbe sodišča opravili hišno preiskavo pri 55-letniku z območja upravne enote Ljutomer zaradi suma, da nedovoljeno poseduje orožje in strelivo. Pred hišno preiskavo jim je izročil revolver z napisom HW7, dva nabojnika, puško z gladko cevjo (ruske izdelave), puško znamke TO2 skupaj z daljnogledom znamke Bushnell in dušilnikom zvoka ter nabojnikom, 248 nabojev različnih kalibrov ter PVC-škatlo, v kateri je bila manjša količina neznane snovi.Policisti so v hišni preiskavi v posebej prirejenem prostoru našli in zasegli še avtomatsko puško znamke M70B1 z dvema nabojnikoma, puško znamke Anschutz, pištolo neznane znamke, ročni možnar znamke MCG012, nabojnik za puško in 374 nabojev različnih kalibrov.


Zaseženi arzenal. FOTO: PP Ljutomer

Zaradi posedovanja orožja in streliva bodo policisti nadaljevali zbiranje obvestil glede suma nedovoljene proizvodnje in prometa orožja ali eksploziva po 307. členu KZ-1.
text:
PHOTO: A Slovene hid them in a specially arranged space
Some were handed over and some were found by police officers.
06 Nov 2019, 08:48 by T.V.



A seized arsenal. PHOTO: PP Ljutomer



Police conducted a house search (symbolic photo) at the 55-year-old. PHOTO: Tadej Regent, Delo


LJUTOMER - Police officers from Ljutomer Police Station conducted a house search on the 55-year-old from the territory of Ljutomer administrative unit on the last day of October, following a court order, on suspicion of possession of weapons and ammunition. They were handed a HW7 revolver, two cartridges, a smooth-bore rifle (Russian-made), a TO2 rifle along with a Bushnell binoculars and silencer and cartridge, 248 rounds of various calibers, and a PVC box containing the cartridge. police officers found and seized, in a specially engineered area, an M70B1 automatic rifle with two cartridges, an Anschutz rifle, an unknown brand gun, a MCG012 handgun, a rifle cartridge and 374 rounds of various calibers.


A seized arsenal. PHOTO: PP Ljutomer

Due to the possession of weapons and ammunition, police officers will continue to collect information regarding suspected illicit production and trafficking of weapons or explosives under Article 307 of the CC-1.
